name: Roubok
description: The leader of the Nmekufian people.

dialogs.responseText: Meguumbappa, hello. Welcome to Nmekufu, I am Roubok, leader of our people. What brings you to our village?
I do not understand your question, Rakuba. Do you not have villages down below?

dialogs.buttonText: Yes, but we do not live in trees.
dialogs.responseText: Ah, I see. But we do.
Though you have managed to find a way up here, I think you will find that many of our people would have trouble finding our way down. It is no trouble, though. For we have everything we need.

dialogs.buttonText: Why do you all have masks?
dialogs.responseText: Our people have made masks for countless generations. They serve two purposes. Protection and freedom.

If you dare to venture any higher than the village, you may encounter a Ruwohane, and wish you had a mask as well. They are dangerous creatures that can draw out your soul from your body if you are not careful.
Identities ground us, in our relationships, in our thinking. When I put on this mask, I became the village elder. When I remove it, I will be the elder no longer. This is my freedom to choose.
